item.title: Food Station
item.description:
"we deliver food at your desired place any time, anywhere also easier than ever". Save time Save money.
"Food station" is an online food delivery company in Biratnagar, with the aim of delivering any food o your choice at your desired place as quick as possible with the development o technology and emerging growth of online services.
Established to serving and delivering the best food in Biratnagar.
item.dc:creator: prakash

item.title: The Hygiene Cafe
item.description: The Hygiene Cafe Specialty for Best Biryani & Thakali food and continental.
item.dc:creator: prakash

item.title: Ghar ko khaja
item.description:
Ghar ko khaja is a one stop solution, pleasing home style lunches. We deliver lunch at your doorstep without any delivery charges and you can also easily order food online nepal. We not only deliver the lunch but the taste and feelings of home, with motto of maintaining your health and hygiene.
We are committed to provide you the best experience in online “BRUNCH and LUNCH” order and food delivery. Ghar ko khaja is a complete food delivery Company. We have expert cooking chefs and punctual delivery personnel’s and will never let you dissatisfied with our services. We know the value of time and money so we are very punctual and we provide the best healthy and hygenic lunch.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Hile Kitchen
item.description: Situated at the heart of Hile bazar, Hile Kitchen is a perfect place to dine or take away junction for foods for your friends and family. We provide you with perfect blend of Nepali as well as continental foods. The local Tongba ( local wine ) is our speciality. Proprietor : PEMBA LAMA
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: ANGAN
item.description: A house of delicious Sweets,Namkeens & Vegetarian Fast Food Restaurant & Catering. Best place in Biratnagar for traditional sweets vegetarian fast food family restaurant.
item.dc:creator: superadmin

item.title: Valentine’s Bakery Cafe
item.description: Friendly environment, clean and modern little cafe specializes in lassies, cakes and momos. It’s popular with students, and one of the few places in the Terai that’s nonsmoking.
item.dc:creator: superadmin
